com.nexttech.spanishreview.worksheet

Class WorksheetGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nexttech.spanishreview.worksheet.WorksheetGenerator

  • public class WorksheetGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by plato2000 on 4/27/16.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WorksheetGenerator()
      No-args constructor - uses a standard Random object and uses baseSpanishWorksheet() to get base worksheet
      WorksheetGenerator(long seed)
      Uses a given seed for RNG, baseSpanishWorksheet to get base worksheet
      WorksheetGenerator(java.util.Random random, java.lang.String[][] baseWorksheet)
      Uses a given Random object (directly) as the RNG, and a given 2D array of Strings as the base worksheet

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Worksheet getBaseWorksheet()
      Gets the starting worksheet used by this Generator
      Worksheet getBlankWorksheet()
      Gets a Worksheet with every possible blank blank
      Worksheet getRegularWorksheet()
      Gets a Worksheet with every possible item blank except for one random in each row
      static java.util.List<java.lang.String> removeBlanksToWordBank(java.lang.String[] row)
      Removes instances of the substring {thing} from each element in the row, replaces them with HTML making them drop destinations on the webpage.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • WorksheetGenerator

        public WorksheetGenerator(java.util.Random random,
                  java.lang.String[][] baseWorksheet)
        Uses a given Random object (directly) as the RNG, and a given 2D array of Strings as the base worksheet
        Parameters:
        random - The RNG to use to randomize
        baseWorksheet - The base worksheet to start at to randomize

      • getBaseWorksheet

      • getRegularWorksheet

        public Worksheet getRegularWorksheet()
        Gets a Worksheet with every possible item blank except for one random in each row
        Returns:
        a Worksheet object with most fields blank

      • removeBlanksToWordBank

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> removeBlanksToWordBank(java.lang.String[] row)
        Removes instances of the substring {thing} from each element in the row, replaces them with HTML making them drop destinations on the webpage. The "thing" is then added to a word bank ArrayList, which is returned.
        Parameters:
        row - An array of Strings that may have {BLANK}s in them
        Returns:
